survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee preferences and usage patterns regarding sustainable office supplies in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your daily work?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your daily work?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clear and concise.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-text option (MULTI_CHOICE with additional text input)

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable office supplies in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable office supplies in your workplace?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using more sustainable office supplies?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-text option (MULTI_CHOICE with additional text input)

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from using more sustainable office supplies?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay slightly more for sustainable office supplies if they were more environmentally friendly?
answer_options: Maybe, depending on the price difference
questions.client_notes: Use a simple single-choice format for clarity.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay slightly more for sustainable office supplies if they were more environmentally friendly?
answer_options: Maybe, depending on the price difference

questions.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable office supplies would you like to see available in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable office supplies would you like to see available in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Has your company provided any training or information about the benefits of using sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple single-choice format for clarity.

script.question_text: Has your company provided any training or information about the benefits of using sustainable office supplies?
